Condition.Diagnostic: Regular simultanious mode should not be available for injected conversion

Condition.Diagnostic: Regular simultanious mode should not be available for injected conversion

Dual combined injected simultaneous + fast interleaved mode (delay between ADC sampling phases: 7 ADC clock cycles)
PossibleValue.Diagnostic: Available only if injected conversion mode is activated

PossibleValue.Comment: Dual combined injected simultaneous + slow interleaved mode (delay between ADC sampling phases: 14 ADC clock cycles)

PossibleValue.Comment: Dual fast interleaved mode only (delay between ADC sampling phases: 7 ADC clock cycles)
Dual slow interleaved mode only (delay between ADC sampling phases: 14 ADC clock cycles)

RefParameter.Description: Multi ADC mode selection: Configures the ADC to operate in independent or multi mode

RefParameter.Description: Select the alignment of the data stored after conversion.

San conversion mode enabled only when Regular or Injected conversion Rank > 1
